summary: Adds some equipment to Fort Dawnguard to get you started as a true member of the Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
~Name~
Dawnguard Starter Pack

~Version~
1.00

~Change Log~
V1.00
Initial release

~Description~
Ever notice that when you join the Dawnguard, Isran sends you off on a job immediately, without giving you any help what so ever?
Now you can join the Dawnguard as a full member, with your own gear!
This mod adds some equipment to the main room at Fort Dawnguard, you should see your gear as soon as you walk in, its sitting on some barrels.

The Dawnguard Starter Pack Contains...

- 1 full set of Dawnguard Light Armor
- 1 Dawnguard Shield
- 2 Dawnguard Ax's (just in case of anyone wants to dual wield)
- 1 Dawnguard War Hammer
- 1 Crossbow & 150 Steel Bolts
- 3 Potions Of Cure Disease
- 2 Potions Of Cure Poison

~Author Notes~
This is my first mod I made and uploaded to the Skyrim Nexus, so tell me if any suggestions you have that could make this mod better! :)
I used to make simple mods for Fallout New Vegas, and then I got Skyrim, so I decided to start making mod for Skyrim too.

~Bugs~
None!

~Recommended Mods~

Dawnguard Paladin Armor - Reborn
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35227/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D35227&pUp=1

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25476/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D25476&pUp=1

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49683/?

~Credits~
Bethesda for making Skyrim & Dawnguard

~Disclaimer~
I do not own Skyrim or Dawnguard

From: The Lone Wolfe
author: xXLoboSolitarioXx
